entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 10:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -5.9°C
Wind: ENE 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or ice pellets beginning this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
